title: Kinetic Machine Works
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: kinetic_machine_works
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Kinetic Machine Works. The average
  contract duration was 0.67 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $722.0K. The longest
  contract was 2.73 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.8M.
lookup_name: 'KINETIC MACHINE WORKS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '29%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-25%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '4'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '467.3K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.67'
s421_mean_contract_value: '722.0K'
s425_max_duration: '2.73'
s422_max_contract_value: '4.8M'
---
